duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support in a complex environment, addressing billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and discounts.
Adapt to each customer, focusing on the outcome to efficiently solve their problems with a consultative approach.
Deliver efficient problem resolution using technology and learning resources.
Analyzing, clarifying, and resolving intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Model Farmers core values and exceed customer expectations.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
